{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3235965,"name":"Erdem Tellioglu","username":"Erdemtel1","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/erdemtel1/{size}/188063_2.png","created_at":"2023-09-29T07:11:46.459Z","cooked":"

FRC TED Robotics #8780 ekibinin Mekanik Kaptanı olarak FRC’de izin verilen motorlar için detaylı bir açıklama dokümanı hazırladım:

Bilginize

As the Head of Mechanics in the FRC team #8780, I have prepared a detailed explanation document for the permitted motors in FRC:

FYI
Motorlar FRC.pdf (2.5 MB)

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":4,"updated_at":"2025-02-11T14:50:26.361Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":64,"reads":202,"readers_count":201,"score":465.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":441591,"topic_slug":"explanation-for-permitted-frc-motors-in-turkish-frcde-izin-verilen-motorlar-icin-detayli-dokuman","display_username":"Erdem Tellioglu","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":2,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"/uploads/short-url/9BrmAymJBjBEYgBccMiAyJ0mddo.pdf","internal":true,"reflection":false,"clicks":0}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":7}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":55700,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/explanation-for-permitted-frc-motors-in-turkish-frcde-izin-verilen-motorlar-icin-detayli-dokuman/441591/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":7},{"id":"angry","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":9,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3235967,"name":"EricH","username":"EricH","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/erich/{size}/128938_2.png","created_at":"2023-09-29T07:56:05.946Z","cooked":"

Is that the full document? It sure seems like there’s a number of permitted motors that are not on there. (Note that a number of them are less common, for various reasons–and not just the shipping cost across the Atlantic.) It may be worth expanding to include some of those. That said, what you do have looks pretty good for the most common motors.

There’s a bit of an issue wit the Falcon, though–and that is that there are two different versions in use, V2 and V3 (and a few V1s I’m sure)–but they have different specifications, most critically in the length dimension. 2023 Falcon Updates and Availability, 2023 Falcon Updates and Availability - #33 by DRow It may be worth some time to make sure both sizes are noted.

The document is missing, Neverest and PG motors continue to be actively used, in addition, there are Turkish teams using Rev HD Hex, and the full list of allowed engines is also available here.
